Text: Contagion is a 2011 U.S. medical thriller-disaster film directed by Steven Soderbergh.

Text: Contagion (film):  The plot of "Contagion" documents the spread of a virus transmitted by fomites, attempts by medical researchers and public health officials to identify and contain the disease, the loss of social order in a pandemic, and finally the introduction of a vaccine to halt its spread.
